name: 傅子恒
objective:
基於學生畢業後的生涯發展，本課程目標旨在提供學生清楚認知未來的生涯發展，進而規劃自己的進路。針對設計學生畢業後的發展可以從學術界與實務界兩方面考量，學術界以直升研究所或工作後再修讀在職專班，而實務界則以可從事的相關職場做介紹與分析各行業的特色與前途，可擔任的職務名稱包括：互動設計師、互動程式設計師、使用者介面設計師、互動廣告企劃等，以供學生參考。
Based on the personal career development,  the course aims to provide a clearly scope and knowledge of future career development. This career can be analyzed in two categories, one is academic field that provide the master program and in-job training program; the another is practical field which concerns about more related design job, such as interaction designer, interactive programmer, user interface designer and interactive advertisement planner. This course not only introduces the design-related job, but also analyzes their characteristics and future development route.
